item.description:
So it's time for another edition of the Improv Incubator. This weeks theme is whatever you please.
Come prepared for some intense warm-ups, scene work, and hot spot followed by a nice outing to everyone's favorite pizzeria.

So bring a smile, a bunch of energy, and most of all a sense of humor and lets make the democracy center rock...

Looking forward to seeing everyone before a well deserved weekend.

Keep it Easy!
Seth
item.how_to_find_us: There are people that are funny and if there not we laugh anyways
item.name: This is a really witty movie name somehow related to improv: IMPROV INCUBATOR
